TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JSScanner extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Scans JScript code searching for individual units of code, or *tokens*. This class belongs to the scanning and parsing category. For more information about scanning and parsing, see [Create a Language Compiler for the .NET Framework](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=110392).

MemberSignature.Value: public JSScanner ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JSScanner (Microsoft.JScript.Context sourceContext);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.JScript.Context sourceContext) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the source code to scan.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetCurrentLine ();
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetCurrentLine() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the current line number in the code. This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
Docs.returns: The current line number in the code.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetCurrentPosition (bool absolute);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetCurrentPosition(bool absolute) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the current position in the code string. This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
Docs.returns: The current position in the code string.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetNextToken ();
.method public hidebysig instance void GetNextToken() cil managed

Docs.summary: Scans for the next token in the code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetSourceCode ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GetSourceCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the source code that is associated with this scanner object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The source code is specified to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.%23ctor%28Microsoft.JScript.Context%29> method or to the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSScanner.SetSource%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetStartLinePosition ();
.method public hidebysig instance int32 GetStartLinePosition() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the position in the code string where the first line of the current code starts. All lines of code are stored in a single string. This is a pointer that moves as the code is scanned.
Docs.returns: The position in the code string where the first line of the current code starts.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetStringLiteral ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GetStringLiteral() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a string that has been scanned and had all its escape sequences replaced.
Docs.returns: A string that has been scanned and had all its escape sequences replaced.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GotEndOfLine ();
.method public hidebysig instance bool GotEndOfLine() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the end of a line was reached after the scanner scans or peeks for a token.
Docs.returns: if the end of the line was reached; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsKeyword (Microsoft.JScript.JSToken token);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsKeyword(valuetype Microsoft.JScript.JSToken token) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified token is a keyword in the JScript language.
Docs.returns: if the token is a keyword; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsOperator (Microsoft.JScript.JSToken token);
.method public static hidebysig bool IsOperator(valuetype Microsoft.JScript.JSToken token) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified token is an operator in the JScript language.
Docs.returns: if the token is an operator; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAuthoringMode (bool mode);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAuthoringMode(bool mode) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets a flag that indicates whether the scanner is operating in authoring mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An example of operating in authoring mode occurs when a host scans the code in an editor to colorize it.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSource (Microsoft.JScript.Context sourceContext);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSource(class Microsoft.JScript.Context sourceContext) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the source code to scan.

MemberSignature.Value: public int SkipMultiLineComment ();
.method public hidebysig instance int32 SkipMultiLineComment() cil managed

Docs.summary: Skips a comment that spans multiple lines, and advances the pointers that identify the current position in the code.
Docs.returns: The new current position in the code string.
